entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
